name: CAR GAME (Prox)
description:
CAR GAME is a racing game without the racing. You try to get to the end and thats it. Ignore those yellow panels; I accidentally let them in but they don't actally do anything, I swear.

This is my submission for the Trijan  #50 game jam. All the code assets and sounds were made during a 3 hour period.

As always, feedback would be very appreciated!
